opis: Prodaje se samostojeća kuća s apartmanima, površine 450m2 u gradu Krku, uz more. Okućnica 600m2. Blizina svih sadržaja. Nudimo povoljne kredite za kupnju, adaptaciju ili izgradnju nekretnina preko renomirane kreditne kuće, posebno za državljane RH koji rade u inozemstvu. Vise informacija na: tel:095 829 1188 / email: geofly.immobilien@gmail.com https://geofly-immobilien.hr/ English: A detached house with apartments for sale, 450m2 in the town of Krk, by the sea. Garden 600m2. Close to all amenities. We offer favorable loans for the purchase, adaptation or construction of real estate through a reputable credit house, especially for citizens of the Republic of Croatia who work abroad.
